title: Intelligent Cyber Systems
description: Intelligent systems are complex and use a wide range of technologies.

title: Information Management Systems
description: IMS are tools used to support processes, operations, intelligence, and IT.

title: Mobile Augmented Reality
description: Mobile augmented reality is one of the most explosive growth areas for AR applications currently.

title: Internet Of Things (IOT)
description: A system of interrelated computing devices, mechanical and digital machines.

title: Simulated Reality
description: Simulated reality is the hypothesis that reality could be simulated to a degree.

title: Smart Energy
description: A smart energy system is a cost-effective, sustainable, and secure energy system in which renewable energy is used.
